name: Euchre Tournament ScoreKeeper
description:
Let Euchre Tournament Scorekeeper keep track of your tournament scores! This Progressive Tournament style app will not only randomly select your teams, but will also randomly select 'byes', while ensuring any 'byes' aren't picked again until all have 'byed'. Keep in mind that by randomly selecting the teams, there is chance you will play with the same partner more than once. All that is left for you to do is to 'Number Your Tables'!

ENJOY!!!

More features coming soon...
